How to Convert DVD to MPG on Mac OS

What is MPG?

MPG video is a series of video standards defined by the Moving Picture Experts Group (MPEG). The common-used standards are MPEG-1(.MPG), MPEG-2(.MPG) and MPEG-4(.MP4). This guide will show you how to rip and convert movie DVDs to MPG on a Mac computer.

Why we need to convert DVD to MPG for Mac?

Many people often convert DVD to MPG on Mac so that they can utilize the videos in various ways, such as playback on PMPs or further video editing. Or just want to save the DVD home videos to the computer. This guide will tell you how to do DVD to MPG conversion with the Mac DVD Ripper to MPEG.

What we need to convert DVD to MPG for Mac

* A Mac computer
* DVD burner and one Video DVD disc
* DVD ripping software for Mac like DVD Ripper for Mac

Below is the step by step guide on how to convert DVD to MPG for Mac

Step1. Download and install Mac DVD Ripper

Free Download DVD Ripping software Mac

Download DVD to MPG converter Mac and running it, and then load the DVD movie from your Mac or DVD Driver.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-dvd-ripper/mac-dvd-ripper-sc.png[/img]

Step2. Select Output Setting

Select MPG from the output formats list in "Format" drop-down list. And the output directory to save the converted files in "Output" drop-down list. You can also adjust other settings such as video quality, audio track, Bitrates, aspect ratio, brightness, contrast, saturation, etc.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-dvd-ripper/common-video-format.png[/img]

Step3. Convert DVD to MPG on Mac

When the settings are done, click the Start Conversion button to start conversion. And then the program will automatically start to convert DVD to MPG file .that's all. When the conversion finished, you can click "Open" to locate the file in your hard drive.

With this DVD to MPG converter Mac's cute and easy-to-use interface, you will have a good mood when you are at work. You can also convert only the outstanding part of the DVD to MPG or another popular format.

The main reason for all these problems may lie in that iMovie will only accept MP4, M4V, MOV files. The solution is to convert AVI to iMovie on Mac compatible format.

My favorite tool for accomplishing this task is Daniusoft Video Converter for Mac. That's it. With Mac AVI to iMovie converter, you can easily convert AVI to iMovie on Mac, import AVI to iMovie Mac (iMovie HD, iMovie 08/09) and then have fun with editing AVI on Mac.

How to Rip a DVD to XviD on Mac OS

What is XVID?

XviD is the name of a popular new video codec being developed as an open source project by volunteer programmers from all over the world. The format was created to offer a free alternative to other commercial video codec's, and despite being open source its quality and efficiency has made it one of the most popular video codes online. While XviD still isn't as widely used as the DivX® codec, playback of XviD movies is usually supported in new DVD players nowadays. To download and install the XviD codec, please click here.

What we need to rip DVD to VOB on Mac OS

A Mac computer
DVD burner and one Video DVD disc
DVD ripping software for Mac like DVD Ripper for Mac

How to burn MOV to DVD on Mac OS X

Want to convert MOV to DVD on Mac OS X?

MOV/.mov is a video Container format for QuickTime. The multimedia container file can hold multiple tracks, audio, video, effects or text files. Each Track, regardless of type, has its own digitally-encoded media stream using a specific Codec. If you have many MOV files that filled with your favorite movies or the happy moments with your family or friends, the best way to preserve these videos or play MOV Video on a standard DVD player is to convert QuickTime Video MOV to DVD on Mac.

What you need to burn MOV to DVD on Mac OS X?

To burn MOV files to DVD, you need a Mac MOV to DVD Converter software that can convert MOV to DVD on Mac OS X(including Mac OS X 10.4 Tiger, Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard, Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard). Daniusoft DVD Creator for Mac is a good choice for you which can help you burn MOV videos to Mac with easy steps. With this Quicktime video to DVD Converter for Mac, you can also edit your videos and customize DVD menu, etc.

Download Daniusoft DVD Creator for Mac

Below is the step by step guide on how to burn MOV to DVD on Mac OS X

Step 1. Load files

Just click "+" button to import MOV files to this program or simply drag and drop them to it. And rearrange the file list by using the up-down arrows.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-creator/dvd-creator-3.png[/img]
Tips: You can freely drag and drop the thumbnail to merge or split the video files.

Step 2. Edit files (Optional)

To personalize your DVD files, you can edit MOV files by clicking "Edit" button. For video files, you can crop the frame size, trim into several clips, append effects, add picture/text watermark watermark and rotate.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-creator/burn-video-to-dvd.png[/img]

Step 3. Create DVD Menu (Optional)

This Mac DVD Creator also allows you to create your own DVD menu with rich selections of DVD menu template. Simply click "Menu" button to select one and set the "Frame", "Button" and "Text" to customize your DVD menu.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-creator/dvd-creator-1.png[/img]

Step 4. Start to burn MOV to DVD on Mac

After all necessary settings, you need to insert a blank or rewritable disc to your Mac if you want to burn MOV to DVD disc on Mac. Or you can simply convert MOV to DVD folder, .dvdmedia or ISO file on your Mac for later burning.

That is it! Now, with MOV movies burned onto the DVD on Mac, you can easily play your videos on your home DVD player.

How to burn TS to DVD on Mac OS X

Why you need/Want to convert TS to DVD on Mac OS X?

"TS" is a transport stream video format based on MPEG-2 part One. It is a communication protocol for audio, video, and data which is specified in MPEG-2 Part 1, Systems (ISO/IEC standard 13818-1) (TS == Transport Steam).

Nowadays, TS files are widely used to broadcast high-definition TV (HDTV). And some Camcorders such as JVC Everio GZ-HD40 also record videos in TS format. A lot of people may have the problem on how to save and watch these TS videos in an easy way. Here is a good way solve this problem - how to burn TS videos to DVD for storage and watch them on DVD players.

What you need to burn TS to DVD on Mac OS X?

So how to burn TS to DVD on Mac OS X? For those Mac users, iDVD doesn't accept these TS formats. Therefore, if you want to burn these TS videos either downloaded from Internet or recorded by camcorder to DVD for storage, you need a TS to DVD Converter for Mac. This Daniusoft DVD Creator for Mac is such a Mac TS to DVD Converter which can help you burn TS to DVD on Mac. Besides the TS to DVD Converter for Mac, you also need a blank or rewritable disc, you can choose either D5 or D9, depending on the file size of your TS videos.

Free Download Mac DVD Burning Software

Below is the step by step guide on how to burn TS to DVD on Mac OS X
Step 1. Load files

Just click "+" button to import TS files to this program or simply drag and drop them to it. And rearrange the file list by using the up-down arrows.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-creator/dvd-creator-3.png[/img]

Tips: You can freely drag and drop the thumbnail to merge or split the video file.
Step 2. Edit files (Optional)

To edit the imported TS videos, you can click "Edit" button. This Mac TS to DVD Converter allows you to trim a video into several clips, crop video, append effects, add picture/text watermark and rotate video.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-creator/burn-video-to-dvd.png[/img]

Step 3. Create DVD Menu (Optional)

This Mac DVD Creator also allows you to create your own DVD menu with rich selections of DVD menu template. Simply click "Menu" button to select one and set the "Frame", "Button" and "Text" to customize your DVD menu.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-creator/dvd-creator-1.png[/img]

Step 4.Start to burn

After all necessary settings, you need to insert a blank or rewritable disc to your Mac if you want to burn video files on DVD disc. Or you can simply convert TS videos to DVD folder, .dvdmedia or ISO file on your Mac for later burning.

Now you've already burned TS video to DVD successfully with this Daniusoft TS to DVD Converter for Mac. And you can watch these TS videos on the DVD Player easily and freely.

How to Burn VOB to DVD on Mac OS

VOB is the extension of the files contained in DVD-Video media. All DVD movies are stored in VOB files on DVDs. VOB file contains video, audio, subtitle and menu in stream form. VOB files are very similar. One may just change .VOB extension to .mpeg and it will be readable and most MPEG players will support it. A player of generic MPEG-2 files can play VOB files, although sometimes only after renaming the file extension to .mpg. MPlayer, VLC media player can play VOB files.

Have you ever felt confused on how to Burn VOB files to DVD on Mac? Maybe at this moment you are anxious to watch films on DVD player at home with your family. Here, there comes VOB to DVD Converter, a tool used to Burn VOB to DVD on Mac. It is a functional conversion tool to successfully Burn VOB files to DVD disc with super fast speed and high output quality.

DVD burner and one blank recordable DVD disc

Download and install Mac DVD Burning Software, and then load VOB files to the program, just click "+" button to import VOB files to this program or simply drag and drop them to it. And rearrange the file list by using the up-down arrows.

How to convert DVD to AVI on Mac

If you're looking for ways to convert DVD to AVI on MAC , chances are you want to copy DVD to Mac and play it on your device like Blackberry, Nokia, etc. But before we move on to cover how to convert and rip DVD to AVI Mac, let's go over the AVI definition.

Audio Video Interleave, known by its acronym AVI, is a multimedia container format introduced by Microsoft in 1992 as part of its Video for Windows technology. AVI files can contain both audio and video data in a file container that allows synchronous audio-with-video playback. Like the DVD video format, AVI files support multiple streaming audio and video.

What you need to convert DVD to AVI on Mac?

To Rip DVD to AVI, a Mac DVD Ripper to AVI is a must have for you. Converter programs are available via the web. Daniusoft DVD Ripper for Mac may be a good choice for you to start ripping DVD to AVI on Mac. It offers a free trial period so you may find it a good idea to try a program before purchasing it.

Below is the step by step guide on how to convert DVD to AVI for Mac

Step1 .Download and install DVD Ripping software Mac

Download Daniusoft DVD Ripper for Mac

Then, just insert your favorite DVD on the DVD-ROM and load your DVD files to Daniusoft DVD Ripper for Mac through "Load DVD". Alternatively, you can hit "Load IFO" to import IFO files. In a minute, your DVD files will be listed at the main panel. There you can learn your original video duration and trimmed video duration if you have trimmed your DVD movies.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-dvd-ripper/mac-dvd-ripper-sc.png[/img]

Step2. Output Setting

Select "AVI" from the output formats list in "format" drop-down list. Go to "Output" to set the output directory to save the converted files. You can also adjust other settings such as video quality, audio track, Bitrates, aspect ratio, brightness, contrast, saturation, etc.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-dvd-ripper/common-video-format.png[/img]

Step3. Convert DVD to AVI on Mac

When the settings are done, click the Start Conversion button to start conversion. And then the program will automatically start to convert DVD to AVI file Mac.

That's all. When the conversion finished, you can click "Open" to locate the converted AVI file on your Mac, Macbook, iMac, Mac Pro, etc. If you don't want to wait around during the DVD to AVI conversion, the smart program can switch off the computer automatically when the conversion is done.

How to Convert WMV to iMovie, import WMV to iMovie for editi

iMovie is a great tool that allows Mac and iPhone 4 users to edit their own home movies. If you have hours and hours of WMV videos you want to edit with iMovie, it might be odd to think of importing WMV movies to iMovie for editing since iMovie only supports MOV, MP4 format, but that’s exactly what I gonna talk about here – how to import WMV to iMovie on Mac, for those who have the same problem with me.

To put WMV to iMovie Mac to edit WMV on iMovie Mac, the easiest and quickest way is to convert WMV to iMovie Maccompatible format Movie File Type, MPEG-2 and AVCHD, DV-Standard and HDV (High Definition Video), QuickTime Movie, MEPG-4, MOV. So a WMV to iMovie Converter for Mac is necessary for us. And Daniusoft Video Converter for Mac is such an easy-to-use Mac WMV to iMovie Converter software that just a few clicks to finish the conversion without any learn curve.

Free download Daniusoft Video Converter for Mac

Note: If you are using Windows, you can refer to Video Converter for Windows.

Instruction to import WMV to iMovie

Step 1: Load WMV file to the program
After you install and run Daniusoft Video Converter for Mac, click "Add File" to load the WMV videos you want to convert. You can load more than one video/audio files at one time.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-video-converter/3gp-sc.png[/img]

Step 2: Set output setting for your iMovie
Choose "iMovie Video MPEG-4 (*.mp4)" format in "Other" category as the output format and choose proper destination folder by "Format" and "Output" option.
[img]http://www.daniusoft.com/images/mac-video-converter/iMovie-format.png[/img]

Step 3: Start to convert WMV to iMovie MPEG-4
Click button to start the conversion from WMV to iMovie video format to edit WMV on your Mac.
